0.2.name: wordpress/stribe-community-network
0.2.description:
Stribe Community Network allows you to easily plug a Stribe.com community in your Wordpress blog. Stribe is a free meta social network for blogs to get more more exposure and traffic by sharing social interactions.

See http://www.stribe.com/blog for more information, real-life examples and to get your free Stribe API key.
